column8: he was the son of the late byron and bessie stephenson. in addition to his parents he was also preceded in death by his first wife
column9: libby thomas and his second wife ruth stephenson
column15: mavis knotts and elizabeth hathaway. he was in the army for 20 years and serviced two terms in the vietnam war and was retired from walker machinery. walter is survived by step-daughter
column25: thad and jacob brown. also survived by several nieces and nephews. graveside service will be held 2:00 p. m. saturday
column27: 2015 at clay memorial gardens. on-line condolences may be sent to the family at www. carlwilsonfuneralhome. comwilson-shamblin-smith funeral home is honored to be serving the stephenson family.
